name: Compound Bow

refinement_effect.refine_one: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 4% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.2% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 5% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 6% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 7% and Normal ATK SPD by 2.1% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 8% and Normal ATK SPD by 2.4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

description: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.
